SELECT pmd.PM_IDX , pmd.PM_PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE , pmd.PM_QUALITY , pmd.PM_STATUS , pmd.PM_CHEMICAL_YN , pmd.PM_ACTIVE_YN , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REG_DATE , pmd.PM_REG_USER , ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER_NAME , ui.USER_ID as PM_REG_USER_ID , pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE , pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER , ui2.USER_NAME as PM_MODIFY_USER_NAME , ui2.USER_ID as PM_MODIFY_USER_ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(pmd.PM_MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') as PM_MODIFY_DATE , pc.COM_CODE , scc.COM_NAME , scc.COM_NATION FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE AND pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE = pc.PLANT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui2 ON pmd.PM_MODIFY_USER = ui.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON scc.COM_CODE = pc.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (pc.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (scc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (pc.PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PART_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ui.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{SEARCH_REG_USER}), '%'))
AND (PM_ACTIVE_YN = #{PM_ACTIVE_YN})
AND (pmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_PLANT_CODE}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_APPROVAL_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE >= #{SEARCH_PM_SDATE})
AND (pmd.PM_APPROVAL_DATE <= #{SEARCH_PM_EDATE})

SELECT msds.MSDS_IDX , pc.PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , cc.COM_CODE , cc.COM_NAME --, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(msds.MSDS_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DATE ,TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(msds.MSDS_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{EXP_MONTH}) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DATE FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DETAIL_MSDS msds LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pm ON msds.PM_IDX = pm.PM_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pm.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE cc ON pc.COM_CODE = cc.COM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(msds.MSDS_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{EXP_MONTH}) <= TO_DATE(#{EXP_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND (cc.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (cc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))

SELECT TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as SEND_DATE , sui.USER_NAME , SEND_BODY FROM SC_MESSAGE_LOG sml INNER JOIN SC_USER_INFO sui ON sml.REG_DW_USER_IDX = sui.USER_IDX WHERE MES_KIND ='SVHC'
